item.title: Scaling up experimental stress responses of grass invasion to predictions of continental‐level range suitability
item.description: How to cite. B. Zhang et al., Scaling up experimental stress responses of grass invasion to predictions of continental‐level range suitability. Ecology. 102, e03417 (2021).

item.title: rSHUD v2.0: advancing the Simulator for Hydrologic Unstructured Domains and unstructured hydrological modeling in the R environment
item.description: How to cite. Shu, L., Ullrich, P., Meng, X., Duffy, C., Chen, H., and Li, Z.: rSHUD v2.0: advancing the Simulator for Hydrologic Unstructured Domains and unstructured hydrological modeling in the R environment, Geosci.
